items.name: The Way of Kings
items.description: Epic fantasy novel with intricate world-building and complex characters.

items.name: Small Gods
items.description: Discover the hilarious tale of a forgotten god in Discworld, filled with humor and satire.

items.name: The Fifth Season
items.description: A tale of a world constantly plagued by catastrophic seismic events, individuals with extraordinary powers, and a search for a daughter amidst chaos.
